channel.title: Craig Hutton, PhD
channel.description: Recent content on Craig Hutton, PhD

item.description: I am a Senior Behavioural Scientist with the Province of British Columbia’s Behavioural Insights Group. I also teach an introductory data analysis course at the University of Victoria and occasionally work as a data science consultant for the Winstanley Laboratory at the University of British Columbia. My diverse training in experimental psychology, applied statistics, and data science leads me to apply a multidisciplinary and creative approach to doing research. I deeply enjoy solving complex problems and exploring new ideas.
